title: INSOMNIA UK League Fest Codes
body:
I am an old NA casual player that currently is on the UK studying. 
Since all my friends are in NA I decided not to switch to EU when I came here. 

Today I went to the INSOMNIA UK League Fest, which was amazing, and got a couple of codes for Arcade Riven and Infernal Diana. I was so excited... until I found out they didn't work on NA.. {{item:3070}}{{item:3151}} {{item:3070}} 

Is there any way I can exchange this or transfer this codes to NA please <3??? I have ways of proving I was the one that attended and not that I just bought them randomly on the internet.

Any rioter that can help?
Thanks in advance

(Me and my girlfriend are exactly in the very same situation).

replies.body: Generally, each region may have their own events and promotions which remains exclusive, so we don't transfer that content between regions.  I can't guarantee that we would be able to make an exceptions for this, but it wouldn't hurt to hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our account team can take a look.  We'll respond asap!

Thank you very much Porocles! 
I'll do that.

Feels bad man i heard that the skins you get were Arcade Riven and Infernal Diana. Hopefully you get it to work on NA but ( You know some people are gonna ask i am just warning you xD ) If it dosen't work do you mind hitting a brother up xD . Sorry for asking D:
xD I'm SORRY MAN . What would he do if support can't do anything he would just have a pointless code D: . #FeelsSorryMan {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Hahaha I guess you have a point. I believe they are only valid until Tuesday, so lets hope i get a response to the ticket by that time (i still havent got any response, sadly) and if it is negative i think ill just give them away
Hey Man have u recieved a reply. I am guessing that code is not going to be valid after an  hour and 15 mins D:
Not yet, and it is supposed to be valid until Tuesday inclusive
Sorry thought you meant it was going to run out tonight instead of ending tomorrow night xD
Oh sorry, i didnt comment any more. Long story short, support said no, cant help, then i gave it to a friend IRL who wanted them in exchange for beer :)
rip 2 mins left and the code runs out
Feelsbadman if support can't help you in the next 50 minutes
